    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_102357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektionstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant de convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente do convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente di convezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύμα μεταφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente de la convección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that hot air rises and cold air moves to replace it. This air cycle is known as convection current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Heißluft steigt und 
Kaltluft bewegt, um sie zu ersetzen. Diese Luftschleife bekannt 
als Konvektionstrom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'air chaud se 
lève et l'air froid se déplace pour la substituer. Ce cycle 
d'air est connu comme courant de convection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o ar quente se 
levanta e o ar frio se move para a substituir. Este ciclo do ar 
é sabido como a corrente do convection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'aria calda 
aumenta e l'aria fredda si muove per sostituirla. Questo ciclo 
dell'aria è conosciuto come corrente di convezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο καυτός αέρας 
αυξάνεται και κρύου αέρα κινήσεις για να την αντικαταστήσει. 
Αυτός ο κύκλος αέρα είναι γνωστός ως ρεύμα μεταφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que se levanta el aire 
caliente y el aire frío se mueve para substituirla. Este ciclo 
del aire se conoce como corriente de la convección.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaltluft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
